summary: Add to Skyrim mechanic magic cast from dark souls 3
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod adds mechanic magic cast from dark souls 3  to Skyrim.
[/size][size=3]When you are using spells, your stamina to spent too.  
[/size][size=3]This mod was developed for  game with  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem[/url]. But can use in the vanilla game.
[/size]
[size=4]Required:[/size][size=3]
[list]
[*]Skyrim 

[*]Dragonborn 

[*]Dawnguard

[*]SKSE
[/list][/size][size=4]Compatibility:[/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Any mods adding spells[/size]

[/list]
[size=4]Example works mod[/size][size=3]:
[youtube]V3HMRO49LIs[/youtube]

[/size]
author: Dimitry
